name: Bonfire (itch) (Bandana)
description:
Try to keep the fire alive as much as possible. Throw your protective disc at enemies and projectiles to destroy them, but beware as you become more vulnerable.

When you charge your thrown again the flame gets teleported back to the disc.

Mouse controls:

  • Click and hold to charge your throw and aim.

  • Release at the right time for extra speed.

Gamepad controls:

  • Aim with left stick

  • Hold A to charge the throw then release.
